fields.title: Refrigerant Full Charge Form
fields.description: This is a form for reporting full charge (or revisions to full charge) of a unit with 50 or more pounds of refrigerant. 82.157(l)(1)

fields.title: Refrigerant Maintenance Form
fields.description: This is a form for reporting each time an appliance with 50 or more pounds of refrigerant is maintained, serviced, repaired, or disposed of, when applicable. 82.157(l)(2)

fields.title: Refrigerant Leak Inspection Form
fields.description: This is a form for reporting refrigerant leak inspections. 82.157(l)(3)

fields.title: Full charge
fields.description: The full charge of refrigerant for the unit. (Pounds)

fields.title: Method of calculating full charge
fields.description: Describe how the full charge was calculated. If using an established range include range, midpoint, and how range was determined.

fields.title: Parts list
fields.description: List part(s) of the unit being maintained, serviced, repaired, or disposed.

fields.title: Refrigerant change
fields.description: Select whether refrigerant is being added, removed (in case of disposal), or unchanged.

fields.title: Amount of refrigerant
fields.description: The amount of refrigerant added or removed. If unchanged, set as 0.

fields.title: Type of refrigerant
fields.description: The type of refrigerant in the unit.

fields.title: Leak rate
fields.description: The rate at which refrigerant is leaking as a percentage. This is the number of pounds of refrigerant divided by normal full charge. If unit is not leaking set to 0.

fields.title: Method of calculating leak rate
fields.description: The method used to determine the leak rate (not applicable when disposing of the appliance, following a retrofit, installing a new appliance, or if the refrigerant addition qualifies as a seasonal variance).

fields.title: Leak inspection method(s)
fields.description: The method(s) used to conduct a leak inspection.

fields.title: Leak location(s)
fields.description: The list of locations where leaks were identified.
